con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sws="http://stamps.com/xml/namespace/2017/02/swsim/swsimv60">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <sws:GetBalanceHistory>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Credentials>\r <sws:IntegrationID>?</sws:IntegrationID>\r <sws:Username>?</sws:Username>\r <sws:Password>?</sws:Password>\r </sws:Credentials>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:Authenticator>?</sws:Authenticator>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:TransactionsPerPage>?</sws:TransactionsPerPage>\r <sws:TransactionDateMin>?</sws:TransactionDateMin>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <sws:TransactionDateMax>?</sws:TransactionDateMax>\r <sws:Filters>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <sws:TransactionType>?</sws:TransactionType>\r </sws:Filters>\r </sws:GetBalanceHistory>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
